Package stratpoint.samuelnieva.ServiceLayer

Interface CartService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CartServiceIMPL
public interface CartService
The CartService interface represents a cart from an e-commerce website. It contains information related to a cart which can then be searched for, added and deleted from the lists in the Cart and Catalog classes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addProduct(ProductEntity p)
    Adds a product to the productList variable.
    void
    delProduct(int n)
    Deletes a product from the list.
    int
    getCartSize()
    Gets cart size.
    double
    getTotalPrice()
    Returns the total price of all items in the cart.
    void
    viewProducts()
    Iterates through the list of products in the cart and uses the outputInfo function to display the information on the product.

  • Method Details

    • viewProducts

      void viewProducts()
      Iterates through the list of products in the cart and uses the outputInfo function to display the information on the product.

    • addProduct

      void addProduct(ProductEntity p)
      Adds a product to the productList variable. In addition to this, the method also adds the price of the added product ot the totalPrice of the cart.
      Parameters:
      p - The Product object to be added to the list

    • delProduct

      void delProduct(int n)
      Deletes a product from the list. The list used in this function is the variable named: productList. This method also subtracts the price of that product from the totalPrice of the cart.
      Parameters:
      n - The index of the product to be removed from the list (First index = 1).

    • getTotalPrice

      double getTotalPrice()
      Returns the total price of all items in the cart. The cart's total is increased and decreased in the addProduct and delProduct to remove the need to iterate through the list and tally the price.
      Returns:
      the total price

    • getCartSize

      int getCartSize()
      Gets cart size.
      Returns:
      the cart size
